Kup: Only Jhiaxus himself being here concerns just Rodimus. The rest of the information effects every Transformer.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Windlord:
 
 "Then would be good know the bad news right now"sighed the male
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus: Well... What was that Earth phrase that Spike told me so 
 long ago? "When it rains it pours." I think that was it. If things 
 are going to slag they might as well all go at once.
 > 
 > xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> 
 wrote:                                  Windlord
 >  
 >  "More problems"muttered the male
 >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 >  >
 >  > ::Rodimus Prime/Kup::
 >  > 
 >  > Rodimus: We wait for the briefing and figure out a way to deal 
 with 
 >  this Decepticon on top of the Predacons and Unicron problems we 
 >  already had. I'm most interested to hear the news Kup brings from 
 >  Cybertron.
 >  > 
 >  > Kup: You won't really like it, lad. Nightlight and Windlord 
 heard a 
 >  bit on the flight here. It's best that I go into full detail once 
 >  with everyone.
